overview: RITRATTI DI FAMIGLIA weaves together the stories of 4 families – Vodret, Bruno, Ricci and Fele – with the precious unpublished archive materials recovered from the Cineteca Sarda di Cagliari, which accompany the reconstructions of the stories of the protagonists as if they were "portraits" to be spread on canvas, starting from the end of the 1920s.
title: Ritratti di famiglia
